archimate:ArchimateModel.name: System and Software Engineering Standards
archimate:ArchimateModel.purpose:
It is a tool for systems and software engineering standards. It contains an overview of the relevant standards.
Use cases: - User wants to read description of the standard on the website of the creator - User wants to know which standards exist on which topics in the environment
This view was created on February 25th, 2020 and updated on March 26th, 2020. Creator: alexander.efremoff@gmail.com
